messages.message: Hello, a partner is using a trial account sent this screen shot, with this note `"While using "Reasoning" the data extraction is sometimes completely wrong, like in this example Instabase keeps returning "Yes" for all scenarios no matter what the inputs are. In this example it explains that Dec 10, 2023 is within dates Mar 21, 2021 & Mar 20, 20222 even though it is not. Do you know why this is happening? I am hoping this is due to a user error."` How can I respond? Any suggestions for rewording the prompt?

I think we should recommend the partner to separate the date checks into multiple fields. For anyone who is verifying if the info is correct, theyâ€™d probably want to see what the effective date is, the expire date is, and the loss date is.

Then use a validation function to verify instead of relying on the llm to do the verification
